CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 23, 1963, pg. 8 reads: "Surprise Shower - Lovely Maude Jones (seated directly in front), wife of bandleader Bobby Jones, was feted at a surprise shower last Sunday at the home of Elizabeth Diggs, on Upland St. Kneeling around her are Corrine Berry, Odessa Berry, Gloria Frazier, Dorothy Gardin, [Berry, Gloria Frazier, Dorthy Gardin - [SIC], Helen Peay, Fannie Baugh, Sandra Kelsey, Peggy Westley, Gloria Davis, Louise Hinton, Althea Blair, Anitha Williams, Geneva Arter, Jean Sumpter and Vera Boulden.  Standing are Ella Smart, Arthela Eberhardt and Elizabeth Diggs. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Maude Jones, guest of honor, surrounded by gifts, and eighteen women, including Corrine Berry, Odessa Berry, Gloria Frazier, Dorothy Gardin, Helen Peay, Fannie Baugh, Sandra Kelsey, Peggy Westley, Gloria Davis, Louise Hinton, Althea Blair, Anitha Williams, Geneva Arter, Jean Sumpter, and Vera Boulden; standing: Ella Smart, Arthela Eberhardt and Elizabeth Diggs, posed in home of Elizabeth Diggs, Upland Street for baby shower
